Package com.viaoa.jfc.control

Controllers for Swing UI components so that they can use binding with OAModels.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ButtonController Functionality for binding JButton to OA.
ComboBoxController Functionality for binding JComboBox to OA.
CustomComboBoxController Functionality for binding custom JComboBox to OA.
CutCopyPasteController Creates system wide cut/copy/paste (c/c/p) components, that listen to focus component for c/c/p changes.
DateChooserController Works directly with OADateChooser for binding an calendar component to an object property.
EnabledController Used to bind a components enabled/disabled value to a one or more Hub/Property value
FormattedTextFieldController Functionality for binding OAFormattedTextField to OA.
HTMLTextPaneController class for binding Editor to Object or Hub.
Hub2TextFieldLookup Used for binding a JTextField component to perform a select on a Hub.
Hub2TreeNode Used by OATreeNodeData for each node in the tree that uses a Hub.
JFCController Implements the HubListener and provides most of the methods required for creating controller Classes (Model/View/Controller) for UI components.
LabelController Controller for binding OA to JLabel.
ListController Controller for binding OA to JList.
OAExceptionDialog Dialog box that works directly with OAExceptions to display dialog when an exception is created.
OATreeTableController Creates a Tree to use as a column in a Table.
TextAreaController Controller for binding OA to JTextArea.
TextFieldController Controller for binding OA to JTextField.
ToggleButtonController Controller for binding OA to AbstratButton.
UndoableController Works with OAUndoManager, supplies UI components with undo/redo functionality.
VisibleController Used to bind a components visible value to a one or more Hub/Property value
 

Package com.viaoa.jfc.control Description

Controllers for Swing UI components so that they can use binding with OAModels.
